title: The Big Watts of ‘Opening Weekend’: Inside the Power Files of the Fastest Ever Omloop and Kuurne
content:
What did it take to hold the wheels of Visma-Lease a Bike's classics rout? Wild wattages and KoM-bothering efforts shared on Strava tell the story.

Read the full article at The Big Watts of ‘Opening Weekend’: Inside the Power Files of the Fastest Ever Omloop and Kuurne on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
